arts.ttl: Union Bears make unwavering Rangers vow after misfiring Ibrox protest – 'we'll continue until there is REAL change'
arts.sum: The fan group headed for the exits in the 55th minute and it sparked widespread derision across the stadium.

arts.ttl: Jo Potter raves about the real Rangers returning to the SWPL title party as warning sent after 14 GOAL pasting
arts.sum: Rangers were the biggest scorers but Glasgow City remain the pick of the bunch

arts.ttl: Clement urges unity as Rangers fans split over walk-out protest
arts.sum: Rangers boss Philippe Clement urges unity as Rangers fans are split over walk-out protest during side's win over St Johnstone.

arts.ttl: Important to 'get synergy back' with Rangers fans - Clement
arts.sum: Rangers manager Philippe Clement says an improvement in results and performances will get fans back onside after some supporters staged a walkout during the 3-1 home win over St Johnstone.

arts.ttl: 'Changing manager not a silver bullet' – Rangers back under-pressure Clement
arts.sum: Rangers chief executive Patrick Stewart says manager Philippe Clement has the board's backing despite an 18-point deficit to Celtic, as he announced a review of all football operations at the club.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement reacts to Union Bears walkout as Rangers boss hears fan anger loud and clear
arts.sum: Clement's team were comfortable winners but the football itself wasn't exactly the dominant story

arts.ttl: BBC airs the 'comical' gaffe Union Bears suffered on exit as TV reporter sums up misfiring Rangers protest
arts.sum: It was a day to forget for the Rangers ultras as they were served up a slapstick departure on their day of defiance

arts.ttl: Don't mention the Rangers war as Clement the Condemned becomes a sideshow on potty Ibrox day – 3 talking points
arts.sum: The ultras headed for the exits after 55 minutes but the move didn’t go down well with a large amount of the rest of the ground

arts.ttl: Rangers beat St Johnstone at subdued Ibrox to ease pressure on Philippe Clement
arts.sum: The Rangers Supporters Association called for Clement’s sacking earlier in the week.

arts.ttl: Angry Union Bears spark Rangers civil war as ultras booed for walking away and diehards fight back
arts.sum: The Union Bears trudged out in the 55th minute as their team found their mojo on a strange day at Ibrox
